game.name: Linkshift
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An addictive new arcade puzzle game with roguelike elements that lets you link Nodes together to form big combo chains. Unlock and create your own set of Jokers to bend the rules, take advantage of randomized boosters and tech yourself onto the leaderboards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An addictive new arcade puzzle game with roguelike elements that lets you link Nodes together to form big combo chains. Unlock and create your own set of Jokers to bend the rules, take advantage of randomized boosters and tech yourself onto the leaderboards.
